/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with tall apartment buildings, their red and white facades standing out against the clear blue sky. Cars of various colors are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the city's vibrant urban life. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a human touch to the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the bright sunlight of the day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
